urls.title: Video URLs
urls.description: List of TikTok video URLs to scrape

hashtags.title: Hashtags
hashtags.description: List of hashtags to scrape videos from (without # symbol)

maxVideos.title: Max Videos per Hashtag
maxVideos.description: Maximum number of videos to collect from each hashtag

skipProfiles.title: Skip Profile Scraping
skipProfiles.description: Skip profile data extraction for faster scraping (bio, email, social links)

concurrency.title: Concurrency
concurrency.description: Number of concurrent browser contexts (higher = faster but more resources)
